languages.text: "Всякое бывало, подруга, всякое! И предметы летали, и людишки, слуги то есть, мерли. Вот как собирались мы вспомнить молодость, да как принимали на двоих полканистры отменного пойла... так оно все и происходило. Помню, мы как-то раз на скорость в темноте вскрывали брюха сервиторам..." {n}Дэгген скалится, потом осекается, покосившись на вас.{/n} "А если серьезно — не, не было в его доме ничего такого. Ничего похожего на колдовство, кроме тех надписей. А как давно оно началось... да ксенос знает. Десять лет назад? Дюжину?"

traits.locale_text: "Всякое бывало, подруга, всякое! И предметы летали, и людишки, слуги то есть, мерли. Вот как мы с Дензом собирались вспомнить молодость, да как принимали на двоих пол канистры отменного пойла... так оно все и происходило. Помню, мы как-то раз на скорость в темноте вскрывали брюха сервиторам..." {n}Дэгген скалится, потом осекается, покосившись на вас.{/n} "А если серьезно — не, не было в его доме ничего такого. Ничего похожего на колдовство, кроме тех надписей. А как давно оно началось... да ксенос знает. Десять лет назад? Дюжину?"

languages.text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"
languages.original_text: "Всякое бывало, подруга, всякое! И предметы летали, и людишки, слуги то есть, мерли. Вот как собирались мы вспомнить молодость, да как принимали на двоих полканистры отменного пойла... так оно все и происходило. Помню, мы как-то раз на скорость в темноте вскрывали брюха сервиторам..." {n}Дэгген скалится, потом осекается, покосившись на вас.{/n} "А если серьезно — не, не было в его доме ничего такого. Ничего похожего на колдовство, кроме тех надписей. А как давно оно началось... да ксенос знает. Десять лет назад? Дюжину?"

traits.locale_text: "All kinds of things happened, lady! Things were flying on occasion, people died too — servants, that is. Whenever me and Denz would feel like remembering our days of youth and getting sloshed on half a jug of the best stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember this one time when we figured we'd see who can carve open Servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from those writings. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

"All kinds of things happened, lady! Things were flying on occasion, people died too — servants, that is. Whenever me and Denz would feel like remembering our days of youth and getting sloshed on half a jug of the best stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember this one time when we figured we'd see who can carve open Servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from those writings. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

languages.text: “哎哟，这些事情都发生过，我的姑娘！确实有东西飞出来，也有人死了，不过死的是机仆。没错，只要我们半壶好酒下肚，开始回忆以前的光荣岁月……就会发生这种事情。我还记得有一次，我们打了个赌，看看谁能在一片漆黑里，以最快的速度砍死那些机仆……”{n}达根咧嘴一笑，随后住了口，瞥了你一眼。{/n}“哦，原来你是说真的。没有，他的房子里从来都没发生过这种事情。除了那些文字之外，根本没有什么巫术之类的。至于那些文字是什么时候出现的……谁知道呢。十年前？十二年前？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

traits.locale_text: “哎哟，这些事情都发生过，我的姑娘！确实有东西飞出来，也有人死了，不过死的是奴工。没错，只要我们半壶好酒下肚，开始回忆以前的光荣岁月……就会发生这种事情。我还记得有一次，我们打了个赌，看看谁能在一片漆黑里，以最快的速度砍死那些奴工……”{n}达根咧嘴一笑，随后住了口，瞥了你一眼。{/n}“哦，原来你是说真的。没有，他的房子里从来都没发生过这种事情。除了那些文字之外，根本没有什么巫术之类的。至于那些文字是什么时候出现的……谁知道呢。十年前？十二年前？”

languages.text: «¡Oh, pasó de todo, muchacha! Cosas volando, gente muerta... solo los sirvientes, claro. Cuando nos apetecía recordar los buenos tiempos y nos metíamos para el cuerpo media botella de licor del bueno... entonces es cuando pasaba todo. Recuerdo una vez que competimos para ver quién podía abrir un servidor a oscuras más rápido...». {n}Daggen sonríe, pero rápidamente se controla y te mira de reojo.{/n} «No, pero en serio, no pasaba nada de eso en su casa. Ninguna hechicería aparte de los garabatos. ¿Cuándo empezó?... A saber. Hará diez o doce años».
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, pasó de todo, muchacha! Cosas volando, gente muerta... solo los sirvientes, claro. Cuando nos apetecía recordar los buenos tiempos y nos metíamos para el cuerpo media botella de licor del bueno... entonces es cuando pasaba todo. Recuerdo una vez que competimos para ver quién podía abrir un servidor a oscuras más rápido...». {n}Daggen sonríe, pero rápidamente se controla y te mira de reojo.{/n} «No, pero en serio, no pasaba nada de eso en su casa. Ninguna hechicería aparte de los garabatos. ¿Cuándo empezó?... A saber. Hará diez o doce años».

languages.text: 「そりゃあもう、色んなことが起こったさ！物が飛ぶのは朝飯前、人もバタバタ死んでいった―召使いだったがね。栄光の日々を思い出したくなって上質な酒をたんまり飲んで酔っ払った時に、大体そういうことが起こったもんだ…ある時、暗闇の中で誰が一番早くサーヴィターの身体をくり抜くことができるか競ったこともある…」{n}ダゲンはニヤリと笑い、ハッと我に返りこちらを見た。{/n}「悪いね、全部冗談だ。あいつの家ではそんなことは起きてない。落書き以外に魔術っぽいものは何もなかった。いつ起きたかは…異種族に聞けばわかる。10年…いや、12年前かな？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

traits.locale_text: 「そりゃあもう、色んなことが起こったさ！物が飛ぶのは朝飯前、人もバタバタ死んでいった―召使いだったがね。栄光の日々を思い出したくなって上質な酒をたんまり飲んで酔っ払った時に、大体そういうことが起こったもんだ…ある時、暗闇の中で誰が一番早くサーヴィターの身体をくり抜くことができるか競ったこともある…」{n}ダゲンはニヤリと笑い、ハッと我に返りこちらを見た。{/n}「悪いね、全部冗談だ。あいつの家ではそんなことは起きてない。落書き以外に魔術っぽいものは何もなかった。いつ起きたかは…異種族に聞けばわかる。10年…いや、12年前かな？」

languages.text: "Oh, bei uns ist alles Mögliche passiert, Mädchen! Fliegende Gegenstände, Todesfälle gab's auch – unter der Dienerschaft. Immer wenn wir die guten alten Zeiten hochleben ließen und einen halben Krug von dem guten Zeug intus hatten ... dann ist so was passiert. Eines Tages wollten wir rausfinden, wer von uns Servitoren im Dunkeln am schnellsten aufschneiden kann ..." {n}Daggen grinst, beruhigt sich und blickt dich an.{/n} "Gut, im Ernst – nein, so was ist in seinem Haus nie passiert. Keine Hexerei mit Ausnahme der Schrift. Und wann das losging ... das wissen nur Xenos. Vor zehn, zwölf Jahren?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, bei uns ist alles Mögliche passiert, Mädchen! Fliegende Gegenstände, Todesfälle gab's auch – unter der Dienerschaft. Immer wenn wir die guten alten Zeiten hochleben ließen und einen halben Krug von dem guten Zeug intus hatten ... dann ist so was passiert. Eines Tages wollten wir rausfinden, wer von uns Servitoren im Dunkeln am schnellsten aufschneiden kann ..." {n}Daggen grinst, beruhigt sich und blickt dich an.{/n} "Gut, im Ernst – nein, so was ist in seinem Haus nie passiert. Keine Hexerei mit Ausnahme der Schrift. Und wann das losging ... das wissen nur Xenos. Vor zehn, zwölf Jahren?"

languages.text: « Oh, ça, il s'en est passé, des choses, dans cette maison ! Des choses qui volent, des gens qui meurent... Enfin, des serviteurs. Quand il nous prenait l'envie de revivre notre gloire passée et qu'on avait déjà sifflé quelques pintes... c'est généralement dans ces moments-là que ça se produisait. Une fois, on s'était même mis en tête de voir qui pouvait disséquer le plus rapidement des servitors dans le noir... » {n}Daggen esquisse un sourire, puis il se reprend et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Hum, plus sérieusement, non, il ne s'est rien passé d'autre dans cette maison. Rien de bizarre, du moins, en dehors de ces inscriptions. Quant à savoir quand ça a commencé... seuls les xénos le savent. Il y a dix ans ? Douze, peut-être ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

Une fois, on s'était même mis en tête de voir qui pouvait disséquer le plus rapidement des servitors dans le noir... » {n}Daggen esquisse un sourire, puis il se reprend et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Hum, plus sérieusement, non, il ne s'est rien passé d'autre dans cette maison. Rien de bizarre, du moins, en dehors de ces inscriptions. Quant à savoir quand ça a commencé... seuls les xénos le savent. Il y a dix ans ? Douze, peut-être ? »

languages.text: "Oho, neler yaşandı neler! Eşyalar havalarda uçtu; insanlar, yani hizmetkârlar öldü. Ne zaman şanlı günlerimizi hatırlayıp güzelce kafaları çeksek böyle tuhaf şeyler olurdu. Bir keresinde karanlıkta kim daha çabuk hizmetör biçecek diye iddiasına girmiştik..." {n}Daggen sırıtıyor, ardından kendini toparlayıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Neyse, ciddi konuşalım. Yok, dediğin tarzda bir şey olmadı. Yazılardan başka bir sahirlik vakası yaşanmadı. Ne zaman başladı dersen... Orasını zenolar bilir. On, on iki yıl evvel olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Oh, all kinds of things happened, my girl! Things going flying, people dying, too — servants, that is. Whenever we felt like remembering our glory days and got sloshed on half a jug of the good stuff... that's when it would happen. I remember one time we decided to see who could carve open servitors in the dark the quickest..." {n}Daggen grins, then catches himself and glances at you.{/n} "All right, serious talk — nah, nothing like that in his house. Nothing sorcerous apart from the writing. As for when it began... xenos knows. Ten, twelve years ago?"

traits.locale_text: "Her türlü şey yaşandı kızım! Eşyalar havalarda süzüldü, insanlar, yani hizmetkârlar, öldü. Ne zaman şanlı günlerimizi hatırlayıp şöyle güzel bir bardak içki yuvarlayalım desek böyle tuhaf şeyler olurdu. Bir keresinde hangimizin servitörleri karanlıkta daha hızlı açabileceğini görmek için iddiaya girdik." {n}Daggen sırıtıyor ama sonra kendini toparlayıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Neyse, ciddi konuşalım. Evde öyle şeyler olmazdı. Yazılardan başka sahirlik barındıran bir şey yaşanmadı. Ne zaman başladı derseniz... Zenolar bilir. On, on iki yıl önce olabilir."
